titleStmt.title: Faire and fowle vveather: or a sea and land storme betweene two calmes. With an apologie in defense of the painefull life, and needfull vse of sailors. By Iohn Tailor.
titleStmt.author: Taylor, John, 1580-1653.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by R. Blower] for W: B[utter?] and are to be solde by Edward Wright at Christ-Church gate,

notesStmt.note: Printer's and publisher's names from STC.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
